name: Space Bunny Blaster
description:
This prototype was quickly put together for a weekly game dev class assignment as a proof-of-concept (Prompt #5: This + That).  For this assignment, I attempted to combine two mechanics into the gameplay: a shooting gallery and moving obstacles. As for the environment, I was mostly inspired by games like paint ball and laser tag obstacle courses. I wanted to design Space Bunny Blaster to look similar to a simulation games found in amusement parks or family arcades!

Credits: Game created by Tengku Hana Shafikah. Made in Unreal Engine. Music used is "Fazer Blast Theme" from the FNAF: Security Breach OST by Steel Wool.
